fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Any EU Legislation affecting the operation of any of the operating companies of IAG.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Consultative Forum on EU External Aviation Policy#E03519#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3519#Member#C
goals__remit:
International Airlines Group is the parent company of British Airways, Iberia, Vueling and Aer Lingus.  
 
IAG combines the leading airlines in the UK and Spain, enabling them to enhance their presence in the aviation market while retaining their individual brands and current operations.
